SEARCH

Class AppService

java.lang.Object
FileManager
AppService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class AppService extends FileManager
AppService class acts as the central coordinator, managing the retrieval, serialization, and storage of jokes into files, ensuring content is categorized and no duplicated are stored, and the UI receives all data needed for user interaction.
